amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Secretary of State to provide training and assistance to identify unknown victims who were murdered in the Mexican city of Ciudad Juarez.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in part B of House Report 109-175 to urge the President and Secretary of State to boost efforts that would aid Mexican authorities in their struggle to pinpoint the identities of yet unidentified remains of murdered young women in Ciudad Juarez, Mexico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
